name: Collapse
description: The enemy's vanguard has appeared to your three o'clock. Deploy melee Operators to stop them.

name: Collapse
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment Points will not automatically recover.

name: Battlefield Treatment
description: Learn how to use Medic Operators.

name: Protection
description: The enemy has sent more troops. Please make sure you have at least 1 Medic Operator in the squad for healing.

name: Protection
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK of all allied units is halved.

name: Directed Aim
description: Learn about the Operators' range and direction.

name: Pursuit
description: Enemy unmanned drones have entered the battlefield. Please deploy your Sniper Operators to deal with them.

name: Pursuit
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Precise Strike
description: Learn how to take on aerial units with Sniper Operators.

name: Brawl
description: More enemy drones have entered the battlefield. Please make sure your Sniper Operators are in a position to deal with them.

name: Brawl
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Sniper Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Vanguard
description: Learn how to use Vanguard Operators and the importance of Blocking

name: Corruption
description: Enemy hounds are extremely fast and can easily slip through our defenses early on. Please deploy a Vanguard Operator to stop them.

name: Corruption
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Assault
description: The path at the bottom of the battlefield has been opened. Please deploy multiple Vanguard Operators to stop the hounds.

name: Assault
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment Points recover at half the normal rate.

name: Originium Arts
description: Learn how to take on high-defense units with Caster Operators.

name: Infection
description: Enemy units equipped with shields have high physical defense. Please deploy Caster Operators to defeat them.

name: Infection
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of Caster Operators is tripled.

name: AoE Attacks
description: Learn about the synergy between Defender Operators and AoE Caster Operators.

name: Hunting
description: Swarms of Originium Slugs are approaching from 9 o'clock. It's recommended to deploy AoE Caster Operators.

name: Hunting
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The max HP of all ally units is halved.

name: Nearl
description: More enemy Originium Slugs and shielded soldiers have arrived on the battlefield. Use a combination of Defender Operators and AoE Caster Operators to suppress them.

name: Nearl
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Defender Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Combat Skills
description: Learn how to use Skills and how to take on strong enemies with Defender Operators.

name: Dilemma
description: Enemy Junkmen have high HP and ATK. Please deploy Defender Operators to block them, and deploy high-damage Operators to defeat them.

name: Dilemma
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DEF of all ally units is halved.

name: Blockade Running
description: Mixed enemy troops are coming from the west. Please make good use of the tactics you just learned, and assemble a suitable squad to deal with them.

name: Blockade Running
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of all melee Operators is tripled.

name: Isolated Island
description:
The battlefield is narrower than before, and the enemies have gotten stronger.
Please make sure your Operators have been upgraded before entering the battlefield.

name: Isolated Island
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The deployment limit is reduced to 4.

name: Sprawl
description:
At the same time, members of the Reserve Op Team have run into new enemies on their way to help... Please pay attention to the surprise attack from the north.
<@lv.item><Fixed Squad></> Unable to edit the squad

name: Running Wild
description:
This battlefield is wider and enemies will attack from two paths.
Please note that enemies coming from the southern path have higher defense. Think carefully about where to deploy your Operators.

name: Running Wild
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Omen
description: The battlefield is even wider this time. You will need at least 3 melee Operators to block all the enemies.

name: Omen
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of all ranged Operators is tripled.

name: Paralysis
description: This battle takes place on Chernobog's main street. Please have at least 4 melee Operators in the squad to block all the enemies.

name: Paralysis
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Obstructions
description: Learn how to use Roadblocks.

name: Catastrophe
description:
Roadblocks help us control enemy movements when they approach from multiple directions. 
Please deploy Roadblocks to control the flow of battle. 
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block a tile on the map. Enemies will attack it if no path is available.

name: Catastrophe
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The number of available Roadblocks is reduced to 1.

name: Indirect Protection
description: Learn to take advantage of whatever may be available on the battlefield.

name: The Tyrant
description:
Please combine your Operators' firepower with the Stun Generator on the battlefield to stop the enemy attack.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: The Tyrant
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment Points recover at half the normal rate.

name: Resolve
description:
Be careful of the large number of approaching enemies, but keep an eye on the agile Reunion leader.
The Stun Generator can stop her movement for a short time.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: Resolve
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The CD time of the enemy leader's ability is reduced significantly.

name: Squad Defense
description: Learn how to protect weak Operators with the deployment order.

name: Rout
description:
Enemies won't slow down their attack even during a Catastrophe.
Please pay attention to enemy ranged units and protect your own ranged Operators.

name: Rout
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Defender Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Remnants
description:
We are not far from the outskirts of Chernobog. Hang in there and victory will be ours.
Please pay attention to enemy ranged units and protect your own ranged Operators.

name: Remnants
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy ranged units have significantly increased range.

name: The Forgotten
description:
At the same time, Reserve Op Team members have run into W, one of the enemy's leaders, on their way to help... Observe W's movements carefully while defending against the enemy attack.
<@lv.item><Fixed Squad></> Unable to edit the squad

name: Pyrrhic Victory
description:
W's troops have launched their attack from Chernobog's labyrinthine streets. Make good use of the environment.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: Pyrrhic Victory
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of Medic Operators is doubled.

name: Tactical Blockage
description: Learn to use Supporter and Caster Operators to take on the enemy's armored units.

name: To Lungmen
description: The paths on the battlefield are tortuous. Consider using Supporter Operators to suppress the enemy's elite units.

name: To Lungmen
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Caster Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Slow-1
description: Please pay attention to the enemy's shielded soldiers, who have high defense.

name: War of Words
description: More enemies with high defense have appeared in the center of the battlefield. Supporter and Caster Operators can reduce their combat power significantly.

name: War of Words
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Supporter Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Slow-2
description: Please pay attention to the aerial units to the north and south.

name: Blockade-1
description:
Deploy Roadblocks in the right places to stop enemies advancing from two directions.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance

name: Blockade-2
description:
The battlefield is even more complicated now. Think carefully before deploying the Roadblocks.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance

name: Presumption of Innocence
description:
Enemies are coming from too many directions this time, complicating your deployment.
Use Roadblocks to control the enemy's advance.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance.

name: Presumption of Innocence
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of Roadblocks and melee Operators is doubled.

name: Casters
description: Learn how to reduce the damage taken from enemy AOE units by deploying Operators in formation.

name: Penguin Logistics
description:
Enemy Elite Casters confirmed.
This type of enemy can pose a huge threat to your Operators. Scatter them.

name: Penguin Logistics
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Caster-1
description: The enemy's Elite Casters have scattered. Protocol advises taking them out one by one with Sniper Operators.

name: Caster-2
description: The enemy's Elite Casters remain the biggest threat. Scatter your Operators to reduce damage taken.

name: Caster-3
description: The enemy has sent even more Elite Casters. Scatter the Operators as previous.

name: Proactive Deployment
description: Learn to intercept the enemy's key units with Operators.

name: Falling Objects
description:
Massive deployment of enemy Elite Casters confirmed.
Protocol advises destroying them one by one.

name: Falling Objects
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of Guard and Sniper Operators is doubled.

name: Hold on Tight
description:
The roof is wide enough to deploy a variety of formations.
Still, watch out for surprise attacks...

name: Hold on Tight
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Caster Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Terrain Attack
description: Learn to destroy tough enemies using the environment.

name: A Matter of Public Health
description: Enemy's new aerial units have been confirmed on your 1 o'clock and 7 o'clock. Please exercise caution.

name: A Matter of Public Health
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The range of enemy's ranged units is increased significantly.

name: Trap-1
description: The roof is not surrounded by railings. Make good use of that and things will be much easier.

name: Trap-2
description: Enemies have become stronger. Using the terrain is still the key to victory.

name: No Promises
description:
Some vantage points on the roof are ideal for sniping the enemy's aerial units.
Also, the roof is not surrounded by railings. Can we use that to our advantage...?
<@lv.item><Anti-Air Rune></> Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly

name: No Promises
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The weight of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Cubiculum Obscurum
description:
The battlefield is narrow this time. Please make sure you have enough melee Operators to stop enemies.
<@lv.item><Anti-Air Rune></> Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly

name: Cubiculum Obscurum
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Suffocation-1
description: Please pay attention to the surprise attack from the south.

name: Suffocation-2
description: The battlefield is completely divided again. Try to defend against enemies from both directions.

name: Suffocation-3
description: Please pay attention to the surprise attack launched by enemy aerial units from the east and west.

name: Beyond Cure
description:
Skullshatterer attacks with her troops! This complicated battlefield will be a test of your skills.
<@lv.item><Medical Rune></> Operators deployed on it are healed over time.

name: Beyond Cure
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of Caster Operators is doubled.

name: Meeting
description:
When fighting in the wild, Operators can take cover in some forms of terrain to reduce damage taken, but please pay attention to the enemy's invisible troops.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Meeting
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of all ranged Operators is doubled.

name: Memory
description:
The enemy has sent even more ranged units.
Eliminate them first as they pose a greater threat.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Memory
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The recovery speed of Deployment Points is reduced by 33%.

name: Convolution
description:
Enemies equipped with a Detector can disable the effect of Bushes.
Be aware of the enemy leader, who has the ability to disrupt our formation.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Convolution
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The weight of enemy units is increased by 1 level.

name: Strategic Redeployment
description: Learn to retreat Operators in time to pass the final test.

name: Crack
description:
An previously unknown enemy leader and an elite team are launching a ferocious attack from 6 o'clock.
Deploy operators to engage immediately!
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Crack
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The recovery speed of Deployment Points is reduced by 33%.

name: Call
description:
Enemy's Invisible Casters have been confirmed on the battlefield.
Eliminate them first as they pose a greater threat.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Call
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK of Medic and Defender Operators is halved.

name: Decision
description:
The enemy has deployed many invisible ranged units.
Use the Detector to launch a counterattack.
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will reveal nearby invisible enemies for a period of time.

name: Decision
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Unable to use the Detector.

name: Roar
description:
The battlefield is complicated. Use Roadblocks to guide enemies into range of our Snipers.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will reveal nearby invisible enemies for a period of time.

name: Roar
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The number of available Roadblocks is reduced by 2.

name: Dusk
description:
Skullshatterer is coming at us with her troops again, only more dangerous...
<@lv.item><Defensive Rune></> Operators deployed on it will have higher DEF

name: Dusk
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Lurking-1
description: Please pay attention to the joint attack of enemy's invisible units and Casters.

name: Lurking-2
description: Enemy only focuses their attack on one spot, but still it's recommended to deploy Operators in the rear.

name: Recon-1
description:
Making good use of the Bushes and the Detector is the key to victory.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy's ranged attack
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will disable the invisibility of nearby enemies for a certain period

name: Recon-2
description:
Enemies are attacking from different routes this time. Please make sure you have enough melee Operators to stop them.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy's ranged attack

name: Recon-3
description: The route is simple this time. It will be a test for your Operators' strength.

name: Ignition-1
description: This battle requires us to concentrate our firepower upon swarms of enemies.

name: Concealed-1
description: A large number of invisible enemies have surrounded the battlefield. Prepare to face them with a solid frontline and far-sighted scouts.

name: Consolation
description: Melee soldiers of another race have been confirmed in Chernobog. Please be careful.

name: Consolation
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The range of enemy's ranged units is increased significantly.

name: A Walk in the Rain
description:
Ranged soldiers of another race have joined the battle.
Protocol advises deploying physical Operators to counter them.

name: A Walk in the Rain
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DEF of all ally units is halved.

name: Artificial Cold
description:
High-energy Originium radiation has been detected in Chernobog.
If enemy units absorb this radiation...
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly.

name: Artificial Cold
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Nerves of Steel
description:
The enemy has launched their final attack and approaches from all directions! Deploy Operators to repel them immediately.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></>Deploy it to block the enemy's advance.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly.

name: Nerves of Steel
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Bureaucracy
description: Enemy melee Arts units have been confirmed on the battlefield. Avoid engaging in melee combat with them. Stay alert.

name: Bureaucracy
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of all melee Operators is halved.

name: Ignorance
description:
Unknown creatures infected with Oripathy have been found on the battlefield. They deal massive damage to nearby Operators when they die.
In addition, please look out for Heated Paths. They emit burning gas.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Ignorance
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment limit is reduced by 3.

name: Mutual Benefits
description:
A large number of creatures infected with Oripathy have appeared on the battlefield!
Think carefully about when to destroy them.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Mutual Benefits
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The explosive damage dealt by enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Acute Stress Disorder
description: A force of mixed enemy troops advances on us from the east. Prepare to engage.

name: Acute Stress Disorder
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The redeployment time of all Operators is doubled.

name: Bad to the Bone
description:
Enemy Elite Casters of another race have been confirmed on the battlefield.
They seem to have special powers. Please be careful.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Bad to the Bone
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DEF of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Extinguished Flames
description:
FrostNova and her elite team have the area completely surrounded.
All we can do now is to engage and hold them at our perimeter.

name: Extinguished Flames
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK and Skill range of FrostNova are increased significantly.

name: Cycle of Enmity
description: Enemy units have been spotted in the wilds outside Lungmen. Beware of the swift moving Breakers and well-protected Spec Ops Casters in particular.

name: Cycle of Enmity
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The ATK of all friendly melee units is reduced by 50%.

name: Inexpressible
description: A large number of Reunion forces have been spotted in urbanized areas of Lungmen. Beware of Breakers approaching from 12 o'clock.

name: Inexpressible
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Attack Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Courage and Mortality
description: Enemy Spec Ops Caster Leaders have spread throughout the battlefield. They can break our operators in an instant without proper preparation against their Arts attacks. Plan carefully.

name: Courage and Mortality
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The range of enemy's ranged units is increased significantly.

name: Nobody's Home
description: A swarm of enemy drones approaches from 4 directions. Beware of a new type of enemy drone, the bomb-carrying Bombtails.

name: Nobody's Home
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Unending War
description: An enhanced version of the enemy Bombtail drone has entered the battle. Their AOE damaging explosive bombs can make quick work of our defensive line. Do what you can to counter them beforehand.

name: Unending War
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The redeployment time of all Operators is doubled.

name: Surprise Attack
description:
The enemy's Arts Master drones are highly maneuverable and capable of launching Arts attacks from above. Counter them with our newly developed Drone Jammer. 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: Surprise Attack
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The cost of the Jammer is doubled.

name: In Life and in Death
description:
Frost Drones greatly reduce the Attack Speed of our nearby units. Counter them with operators or Jammers to prevent them from using their abilities. 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: In Life and in Death
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Sniper and Caster Operators may not be deployed.

name: Intimate Knowledge
description:
A group of strange enemy soldiers with regeneration abilities have arrived on the battlefield. Eliminate them as quickly as possible. Arrange your deployment to avoid enemy Turrets. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Intimate Knowledge
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DEF of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: The Devil
description:
Things just keep getting stranger... Enemy Veteran Junkmen now have regenerative abilities as well. Take care to eliminate them as quickly as possible. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: The Devil
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The HP of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: The Dark Before Dawn
description:
We are now deep behind enemy lines and there is no going back. Use your tactical expertise and find a way through the crossfire between Mephisto and Faust! 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: The Dark Before Dawn
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Mephisto's HP and DEF are greatly increased.

name: Decisive Counterattack
description: Victories are short, but wars are long, and our enemies are unknown.

name: Deadlock
description: Heavily-armored Infected hosts have appeared in Lungmen's urban districts. Not only are they able to shrug off most blows, but they are also capable of regenerating. Exercise caution when dealing with them.

name: Deadlock
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment limit is reduced by 2.

name: Misunderstandings
description: What kind of abominations are those?! New, grotesque Infected combatants have been seen throughout the combat zones of Lungmen. Their speed and power greatly exceed that of regular hosts, so please be careful!

name: Misunderstandings
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Attack Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Lost at Once
description: The ranks of these aggressive hosts continue to grow, and they will soon apply heavy pressure to our formation. However, their lives seem to also be quickly burning out...

name: Lost at Once
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Enraged Possessed Soldiers have greatly increased ATK.

name: Festering Scars
description: This area is under attack by aggressive hosts that hurl projectiles at us. Please beware of their long-range attacks.

name: Festering Scars
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Enraged Possessed Throwers have greatly increased HP.

name: Who to Kill?
description: A large number of both melee and ranged Possessed Soldiers have appeared. Perhaps a well-planned defense can halt their onslaught...

name: Who to Kill?
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Enraged Possessed Units no longer lose HP over time.

name: Leave it Behind
description: He has never forgotten the promise he once made...

name: Broken Strings
description:
As the commander of Rhodes Island, you must direct your Operators in a battle against Faust, one of the leaders of Reunion. Be careful.
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: It Fell From the Sky!
description: The legendary Yeti Squadron, an elite anti-Ursus squad of Infected, has appeared in a Chernobog sub-city. Their fighting style is unlike any Reunion forces we've encountered before, so make sure not to underestimate them.

name: It Fell From the Sky!
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The Speed of enemy units is increased significantly.

name: Harsh Environment
description: Learn about the 'Cold' and 'Frozen' status effects.

name: Different Perspective
description: The Yeti Squadron, in addition to fielding casters that specialize in ice-based Arts, has also released Originium Slugs that explode in a shower of rime upon death. Please exercise caution.

name: Different Perspective
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Yeti Squadron units and Frostfangs deal even more damage against Frozen units.

name: Bells of Liberation
description: The icecleavers, a special group of combatants of the Yeti Squadron, deal massive damage to frozen Operators. Stay calm when fighting them.

name: Bells of Liberation
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Yeti Icecleavers have greatly increased HP and ASPD.

name: 'Times Like These'
description: A large number of Yeti Squadron troops have launched an offensive against us, and an arduous battle looms ahead. Make good use of our Operators' various strengths and aim to defeat the enemy.

name: 'Times Like These'
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
7 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them.

name: Snow Upon the Tundra
description:
The Yeti Squadron has placed special Originium facilities around the battlefield. Please be prepared to respond accordingly. 
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Snow Upon the Tundra
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Originium Ice Crystals release frigid waves more frequently.

name: No Light Without Fire
description: She has never forgotten about that certain place...

name: Frost Upon the Tundra
description:
The 'Oneiros' drones controlled by the Yeti Squadron are capable of inflicting Arts damage in an area upon our Operators, as well as inflicting the Cold status. Please prioritize taking them down.
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Frost Upon the Tundra
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Oneiros drones have greatly increased movement speed.

name: Nostalgia
description: Enemy icecleavers have been spotted in conjunction with Oneiros drones. As this will surely be a very difficult battle, please plan carefully to deal with various status abnormalities and enemy attacks.

name: Nostalgia
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemy Oneiros drones have reduced range, but greatly increased HP and DEF.

name: Black Rabbit, White Rabbit
description:
Before us stands the commander of the Yeti Squadron, FrostNova, enhanced with a terrifying power we've never seen before. As she is one of the strongest warriors in Reunion, we must utilize every bit of our strength to overcome her.
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Black Rabbit, White Rabbit
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Medic Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Winter's End
description: We chose to fight to the bitter end. She did as well.

name: Only You Know
description: She has never forgotten about that night...
A person walks into the sunset, alone.

name: Night of Farewells
description: Remnants of Reunion's forces remain entrenched in the streets of Lungmen, desperately resisting to the bitter end. Prepare for combat.

name: Night of Farewells
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Possessed Veteran Junkmen and Possessed Soldier Leaders have greatly increased HP.

name: Renegade Blade
description: Mephisto's Herd is no longer under the control of its leader, but their bottomless aggression has prompted them to attack Rhodes Island's ship. Put them out of their misery.

name: Renegade Blade
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DEF of allied units is halved.

name: Side by Side-1
description: The spearhead of Reunion's reconnaissance force has appeared at the location where we established a concealed facility. Be careful, these are no ordinary Reunion grunts that we're dealing with.

name: Side by Side-1
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
All enemies have increased Movement Speed.

name: Side by Side-2
description: Various Reunion members patrol the passages of the hub layer in the heart of Chernobog. Don't take them lightly; their uniforms... are the same as the Infected guerillas that once fought in the northern tundra of Ursus.

name: Side by Side-2
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DP Cost of Ranged units is doubled.

name: Focused Strike
description: Learn how to counter the commanding tactics of Reunion's guerrilla forces.

name: Forgotten Lands
description: We've encountered guerilla messengers on our way to the central area of the core city. They employ a unique method of communication and commanding, and we may perhaps be able to draw some inspiration from fighting against them...

name: Forgotten Lands
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
All enemies have increased HP.
A knot that, to this day, has still not been untied.

name: Fury of the Silent-1
description:
We've found a strange Sarkaz Originium altar in the hub layer... The altar seems to have a strange effect upon the surrounding environment, but we can also leverage it to mount a defense against the enemy.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Fury of the Silent-1
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
All allied units have -1 Block.

name: Fury of the Silent-2
description:
Our enemies are no longer fighting in the characteristic style of scattered guerillas. Now is a head-on clash between tactics. Formulate your combat strategy appropriately, and deal a critical blow to the enemy.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Fury of the Silent-2
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Guerrilla Heralds have greatly increased HP.

name: Flames of the Faint
description:
Sarkaz warriors have entered the battlefield, but be wary - they don't seem to be from the same faction as the guerillas. They even seem to draw inspiration from the Originium altars...?!
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Flames of the Faint
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Mercenary Sarkaz Fighters have greatly increased ASPD.

name: Stained-1
description:
Sarkaz Casters have appeared on the battlefield, and it seems like the Originium Altars may be affecting their Arts. However, don't panic - we have ways of dealing with them.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Stained-1
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemies have -60% Movement Speed, and greatly increased HP and ATK.

name: Stained-2
description:
As Reunion's elite warriors, the Sarkaz Mercenaries have shown formidable strength. Only by defeating them can we continue forward.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block the enemy's route

name: Stained-2
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemies have greatly increased DEF.

name: Aegis of the Infected-1
description: The horn has been sounded. Face the legendary guerillas of Ursus, and turn their own tactics against them! However, those heavily-armored guerilla warriors are indeed the most terrifying combatants of the Ursus army...

name: Aegis of the Infected-1
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Sniper and Guard Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Guerilla-1
description: The mortars used by the guerillas pose a significant threat to us. These weapons taken from Ursus's military arsenal are terrifying incarnations of the very essence of war.

name: Guerilla-1
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
All enemies have significantly increased ATK.

name: Guerilla-2
description: The guerillas' Vertical Strike Squad has withstood harsh trials and brutal wars. They've fought Ursus for more than a decade, and their will is nigh indomitable. We have but a single moment for a chance at victory.

name: Guerilla-2
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Guerilla Shieldguards have 66% lower Max HP, but have 50% increased DEF and RES.

name: Unrivaled
description: Who has witnessed a battle like this before? Who can survive such a battlefield? Even a simple skirmish has struck fear into our hearts. We do not have the ability to defeat them. We must escape to where they cannot see us.

name: Unrivaled
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Maximum squad size is reduced to 7 Operators.

name: Aegis of the Infected-2
description:
We cannot destroy them, so we will do our best not to be destroyed by them. We must achieve a tactical victory. We strive to paralyze their spinal cord and expose the giant's head to us.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Aegis of the Infected-2
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Guard and Caster Operators cannot be deployed.

name: Death of a Patriot
description:
They are commanded by the 'Aegis' of the Infected. The most ancient bloodline among the warriors of Sarkaz. Ursus's indomitable incarnation of war. The backbone of the Reunion Movement. Yelena's father.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Death of a Patriot
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
6 tiles on the battlefield are no longer available for deployment.
It's like a city driving towards finality.
Throw open the doors that lead to this world.

name: Yesterday, the Chaff Cracked
description:
In the remote tundra, patrol squads, dressed in black beetle-like uniforms, comb through remote villages to hunt down the Infected. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></>Blocks the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.

name: Yesterday, the Chaff Cracked
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
3 tiles on the battlefield are no longer available for deployment.

name: Today, Sanguine Overlows
description: 10:32:09 The war continues, but the situation has changed.

name: Civilian Evacuation
description:
Learn how to evacuate civilians from conflict zones. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units. 
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Innocent Flesh and Blood
description:
In the tundras of Ursus, every living creature is under suspicion. They may be murderers, thugs, spies, or simply innocents. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units. 
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Innocent Flesh and Blood
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
All allied units have -1 Block.

name: Oatstalk, Easily Alight
description:
Righteous anger from witnessing such brutality is justified. Ursus's manglers are well-trained, and their fangs do not cease just because of their victims' emotions. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Oatstalk, Easily Alight
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
The DP Cost of Ranged units is doubled.

name: Silence, Born of Excessive Speech
description: Kal'tsit has never demonstrated impatience when explaining a story to others. She is either very good at controlling herself, or she actually enjoys it.

name: Sparks, Extinguished in a Touch
description:
Sometimes, protecting others is not a goal, but a process. Also, Ursus's crossbowmen also privately believe that killing others is not a goal, but a process. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Sparks, Extinguished in a Touch
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enemies have significantly increased ASPD.

name: Death, Comes When Beckoned
description: In reality, just witnessing an atrocity is enough to make one become a part of it.

name: Cold, Only Perceived
description:
The lowest recorded temperatures of the Northwestern Tundras are sometimes not as bone-chilling as the words of certain individuals. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.
<@lv.item><FrostNova's Originium Ice Crystal></> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold on affected enemy units.

name: Cold, Only Perceived
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Ursus Raiders have significantly increased ATK and DEF.

name: Will, Phantom Wisps
description: All ideals, once transmitted, will eventually be corrupted or altered. Only through practice can an ideal be proven, and as we know, once something happens, it cannot be undone.

name: War, Sprawling Without Cease
description:
The mightiest and meekest both share the same tenacity. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.
<@lv.item><Patriot's Originium Altar></> Periodically releases gas in the surrounding 4 tiles, inflicting heavy damage to enemies.

name: War, Sprawling Without Cease
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Ursus Armored Casters have significantly increased attack range.

name: Ruination, Long Awaited
description: With enough effort, drops of water can pierce through stone. Everything you've experienced will coalesce into the truth and spread across this land.

name: Baptism by Tractor Fire
description:
Within the Ursus Army, the history of the Artillery Corps is not particularly lengthy. They are more than happy to arm themselves with the newest technology, and have little concern to spare for who their enemies are. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Baptism by Tractor Fire
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Imperial Artillery Targeteers have greatly increased HP.

name: The Heart, Fickle and Impermanent
description:
If you wish to prove yourself before a legend, you must first <@lv.sp>approach perfection</>. Only the commoners shall bleed. Only the noble shall face slander. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: The Heart, Fickle and Impermanent
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Your units have significantly decreased ATK.

name: Farewell, to Reunite Once More
description: 07:29:28 Though some friends may be willing to share your pain, you should perhaps <@lv.sp>reach out to them</>. And some may never have been your friends in the first place.

name: Farewell, to Reunite Once More
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Enraged Possessed Soldiers, Enraged Possessed Leaders, and Enraged Possessed Bonethrowers have increased ASPD.

name: Reunited, Only to Separate
description:
To lose. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Reunited, Only to Separate
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Obstacles have greatly increased HP.

name: Silent Butcher
description:
The Empire of Ursus has lost many elites throughout its many wars, but is always able to cultivate more. Just as an empire should. 
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block the enemy's route.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Silent Butcher
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Deployment limit is reduced by 3.

name: Malediction, Bound for Retribution
description: She has not yet died, but she has already seen too much death.

name: Malediction, Bound for Retribution
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Sarkaz Centurion Hosts have significantly increased lifesteal.

name: Snowfall, Blackening the Earth
description:
Yet, they do not regard anyone as an 'enemy.' The dead and the incompetent have never been among their ranks.
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Snowfall, Blackening the Earth
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Imperial Strikers and Elite Imperial Strikers have increased ATK and HP.

name: Awakening, a Dream's End
description: An origin, a purpose, a fate, a demise. A tragedy that claims the Herd, all of them. Who can truly <@lv.sp>choose</> their own life?

name: Awakening, a Dream's End
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Toxic dust from Mephisto, 'The Singer,' deals significantly increased damage.

name: Ire, Flowing Wilderward
description: 'So I wish to make a wager with you.'

name: Behold, the Twilight Comes
description:
Memory and reality have both been completely released, and she knows her time has come. 
(Part of this story cannot be skipped the first time you experience it.)
<@lv.item><Heated Path></>Periodically deals great damage to any units on it.

name: Behold, the Twilight Comes
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Talulah begins in the Enraged state.

name: Arise, Treading Through Flames
description:
06:26:33 <@lv.sp>Split flame with sword</>, defeat the past with the present, and confront the chaotic with one's self. Rage, and know no compromise. Rage, and keep no silence. 
<@lv.item><Energy Aggregate></>Releases fireballs in the four cardinal directions, dealing Arts damage and inflicting [Burning Breath] (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be resisted)

name: Arise, Treading Through Flames
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
Summons: Energy Aggregates deal increased Arts damage.

name: Burnt Fragment 3
description: A matter of choice.

name: Burnt Fragment 2
description: A matter of protection.

name: Burnt Fragment 1
description: A matter of honesty.

name: Burnt Fragment 4
description: A matter of trust.

name: Burnt Fragment 5
description: A matter of self.

name: Cluster-1
description:
Make good use of the Active Originium in the middle of the battlefield and things will be much easier.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Cluster-2
description:
Enemies are coming from more directions. Still it's recommended to build your defense around the Active Originium.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Cluster-3
description:
The alien force has split into two. It may be a good choice to consume their HP by the Active Originium.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Myriapoda-1
description: Please be careful of the Originium Slugs in the south and the north and don't let them go through our defense.

name: Myriapoda-2
description: The battlefield is narrow this time. Please think carefully about where to deploy Operators.

name: Myriapoda-3
description: The battlefield is even narrower. It's recommended to upgrade Operators to get through it.

name: Rage-1
description: Please pay attention to the joint attack of enemy's Originium Slugs and alien elite Casters.

name: Rage-2
description: Scatter the Operators and use ranged Operators to take out the Originium Slugs from afar.

name: Rage-3
description: There is not much space for melee Operators this time. Try using Specialist Operators to cope with the tough enemies on the left.

name: Stand Firm-1
description: A large number of elite enemies have appeared. Please be careful.

name: Entrenched-1
description: The enemies continue their massed assault. Beware of the Wraiths sneaking in from above.

name: Entrenched-2
description: The situation in the field is getting more complicated. Carefully deploy melee Operators to stop the swarm of enemy Breakers.

name: Biting Cold-1
description: Well armored Frost Drones are causing havoc with our forces. Counter them with Caster Operators.

name: Biting Cold-2
description:
The enemy force is a mix of Arts Masters and Frost Drones making it increasingly difficult to handle. Make use of Sniper and Caster Operators and don't forget our Jammers! 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: Panic-1
description:
Possessed Soldier Leaders can regenerate faster and pose a serious threat. Take them out first. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Panic-2
description:
Defense Crushers are enemy elite units specialized in defense. Their attacks can also stun our melee units. Take advantage of their slow moving speed to counter them. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Hover-1
description:
A large number of unmanned enemy drones have appeared on this operation. Please take charge of the anti-air defense.
<@lv.item><Jammer></> Stops nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduces their speed, and prevents them from activating special abilities.

name: Hover-2
description: Enemies attack from different directions in this battle. Be careful of the large number of Casters that are approaching.

name: Abnormality-1
description: A number of possessed enemies have appeared during this battle. Please make sure to fortify your defenses.

name: Condensation-1
description: The Yeti Squadron is utilizing Infused Glacial Originium Slugs in their assault upon us. Please be careful of these aberrant creatures.

name: Condensation-2
description: A failure to handle the synergy between Infused Glacial Originium Slugs and Icecleavers will result in massive losses.

name: Hoarfrost-1
description: An attack from a large number of Infused Glacial Originium Slugs, followed by a wave of Icecleavers, will inflict catastrophic damage to insufficiently prepared squads.

name: Hoarfrost-2
description:
Surrounded by a harsh environment filled with Originium Ice Crystals and powerful Icecleavers, how are we to mount a response to this attack? 
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Ambush-1
description:
Make good use of neural interference landmines to deal with guerillas that are difficult to injure through normal means.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Ambush-2
description:
Use interference mines to establish a defensive line, expand our advantages, and accomplish our strategic goals.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Operation Inferno-1
description:
The enemy is attacking with the full force of their drone armada! Proper use of Snipers and Casters is the key to victory. 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: Operation Inferno-2
description: The terrain on this battlefield is relatively simple, but beware of enemy Casters. Consider deploying units with high Arts Res to draw their fire or take advantage of the holes on the ground.

name: Operation Inferno-3
description:
The battlefield is full of winding roads and blanketed in a poisonous haze. These factors have greatly hindered our ranged Operators' effectiveness. Consider deploying more Medic Operators maintain consistent healing. 
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: Operation Inferno-4
description:
Faust has returned even stronger than before, and all Turrets on the field have been greatly enhanced. Plan your deployment positions and operators carefully to repel Faust's ferocious attack! 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Operation Cocytus-1
description: Elite enemy troops, as well as Enraged Possessed Soldiers, have launched an offensive against us. Please make use of the central road to mount an effective defense.

name: Operation Cocytus-2
description:
The Possessed Soldiers are launching a vicious two-pronged attack, and we must stay calm if we are to deal with the threat.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly.

name: Operation Cocytus-3
description: The location of the Infused Glacial Originium Slugs will pose a significant threat to our Operators. Please think carefully about how to deal with these troublesome creatures.

name: Operation Cocytus-4
description:
The fully empowered FrostNova has returned to the battlefield. Use your tactical acumen to endure the blizzard! 
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Operation Starfire-1
description:
Guerilla warfare does not preclude a frontal attack. Such a battle almost always leads to a decisive victory or a marked defeat. In this open terrain, who will benefit from this battle?
<@lv.rem>In this battle, Operator deployment is not restricted by melee/ranged designations.</>
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block the enemy's route

name: Operation Starfire-2
description: This war of attrition has sapped us of our energy, but only miserable defeat awaits us should we give up now. Hold on! There must be an opening in the enemy's assault...

name: Operation Starfire-3
description:
In a harsh environment, the side that better adapts to the conditions has more chances to seize victory. However, who can afford these kinds of sacrifices?
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Operation Starfire-4
description:
If you've never seen their formation in the past, you will not understand why they were feared by all living creatures upon the battlefield. Perhaps there are people out there who can describe how Ursus crushed civilization itself...
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Operation Erebus-1
description:
A precious yet fragile life. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Operation Erebus-2
description: A scorching yet unrelenting flame.

name: Operation Erebus-3
description: A broken yet harrowing song.

name: Operation Erebus-4
description:
An arrogant yet terrifying god. 
<@lv.item><Energy Aggregate></> Releases fireballs in the four cardinal directions, dealing Arts damage and inflicting [Burning Breath] (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be resisted)
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

description:
Mafiosi of unknown affiliation stand at the door, weapons in hand.
Texas is intent on coming home, and someone is intent on stopping her.

name: Cittanova Main Street
description:
Mafiosi start fighting in a pizza parlor. Protect the patrons as they try to make an exit.
Texas still detests it all, but there is little she could do.

name: Carwash
description:
He dreams of a purge.
The joy in the dream was real. He could taste the excitement he felt. He wants to taste it again.

name: Saluzzo Estate
description:
Complete Alberto's mission.
Lappland knows that her father is testing her. He does not want to be disappointed. She has different ideas.

name: Bellone Estate
description:
There is a traitor within the Bellone famiglia. Feign injury and bait them.
Beware those disguised as doctors and judges. No one called them.

name: Back Alley
description:
She hooks a Saluzzo spy after a long wait.
Lappland giggles.

name: Saluzzo Estate
description:
Resentment for Lappland is building within the famiglia. They await her reaction.
She takes up arms.

name: Volsinii Courthouse
description:
Protect the civilians targeted by the mafiosi.
In Siracusa, the law represents the will of one. As the agent of that will, Lavinia finds herself struggling to protect ordinary citizens.

name: Back Alley
description:
A familiar sight at the fruit stalls.
Deal with those who are making deals without permission. The famiglie can have only one voice.

name: Teatro di Milano
description:
An ambush is laid around the theater. The assassination of Rossati is about to be carried out.
It is his master's orders. The chaos of the city continues. He must do everything for his famiglia.

name: Back Alley
description:
Pursue the arsonist.
Lappland knew they would justify the purge with the theft that occurred in the Saluzzo Estate a few days ago. But now that she knows, she does not want them to open their mouths again.

name: Penguin Logistics Office
description: The bustling streets fall silent at Texas's appearance. The people probe at one another, trying to entice her to leave. Anyone who tries to talk to her is taken down by another. Perhaps there is something they want to say to her, and she should act first.

name: Cittanova Main Street
description:

The conflict between the famiglie never ends, even for a carwash worker who only washed Alberto's car once.

name: Volsinii Municipal Center
description:
Protect the people from harassment by the scattered mafiosi.
Timely aid helps one remember who is truly on their side. They will remember Texas's act of kindness.

name: The Arrival

name: Daybreak Point - Awareness
description: 'Welcome, competitors. You will face your OpFor challenge for the first time here. Do not underestimate them, but do not be overly cautious either. In Minos, risky but efficient tactical thinking is most appreciated by the judges.'

name: Daybreak Point - Ideal
description:
Mt. Hymnoi is Minos's second highest point above sea level, and the legendary site where its heroes assembled.
Now, we stand on the very same ground as those heroes.

name: Daybreak Point - Sense
description:
The Interlocking Security Competition is one of the few events where Minos allows the Infected to compete in.
During it, such competing athletes are permitted only to spend their free time within competition bounds.
It is forbidden to leave the grounds without having obtained permission, on threat of coercive measures.

name: Daybreak Point - Attribute
description:
'You didn't know? Not long ago, the 'Goddess of Victory' emerged from nowhere, guiding the Minoans to repel those ferocious Sargon invaders...' 
'The 'Goddess of Victory' showed up, brought victory to the Minoans, and then simply left without a word. Such a missed opportunity... if her feats were formally recorded in the Hall of the Twelve Heroes, she would've been conferred great hero status, no doubt! And now all that's left for us is the legend to tell.'

name: Daytime Ground - Conduct
description:
This is the Garrison Team's first time splitting with the squad. Be alert for anything.
If you want to challenge the mighty OpFor on the Twilight Frontier, then you need to send a team to garrison here. Withdrawal from here means losing your right to challenge that one additional OpFor Unit.
Calm down. Think slowly. Rational personnel planning will reward you with greater points for an utmost advantage.
<@lv.rem><Command Terminal></>Deducts 1 Life Point if destroyed

<@tu.ht>Garrison Effect: <Hymnoi Hero> will proceed to the Twilight Frontier</>

name: Daytime Ground - Illusion
description:
'Hello? Hi, committee, we've been set up here for twenty minutes. Why has a judge still not come to certify? Quit slacking! Clock-out time is a mile away!'
'...How lazy can you Minoans be? How do you even have 'afternoon tea' in work hours?'

<@tu.ht>Garrison Effect: <Hymnoi Warrior> will proceed to the Twilight Frontier</>

name: Daytime Ground - Meditation
description:
Can you see it within OpFor? The shadow of the past stands before you now. Witness yourself compelled to pick up arms anew, and charge upon a familiar silhouette... for they will come calling, again and again.
Calm yourself. Drink some hot water.
<@lv.rem><Command Terminal></>Deducts 1 Life Point if destroyed

<@tu.ht>Garrison Effect: <Hymnoi Hero> will proceed to the Twilight Frontier</>

name: Daytime Ground - Perseverance
description:
'The view of the Hymnoi land's not too bad from here. If you're not Infected, use your free time on your last day to climb the mountain and take in the sight of everything. Just imagine.'
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold on affected allied units
<@lv.item><Roadblock></>Deploy to block the enemy's route

<@tu.ht>Garrison Effect: <Hymnoi Warrior> will proceed to the Twilight Frontier</>

After Garrisoning Daytime Ground, Special OpFor Units will appear in the Twilight Frontier; Special OpFor Unit do not deduct Life Points when spared

name: A Bolt From the Blue Oasis
description:
Kal'tsit and the survivors travel on foot to a large oasis, where many animals come to slake their thirst. Of course, enemy scouting drones are here too, things that are much less reliant on water.
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Cactus Dunes
description:

<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Blockade of the Singing Sands
description: The shifting of each grain of sand tells a story. As Kal'tsit predicted, the pursuing soldiers arrive on schedule, throwing themselves into the snare.

name: Pine Lilies
description: No patch of soil pays any heed to the blossoming of a few clusters of flowers— The land does not care, for the land encompasses all things.

name: Reefsteep's Land
description:
'The land encircled by reefs,' 'a place where reefs are embraced.' Looking up, Elliot sees no reefs. Are the people here hallucinating?
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Padishah's Dream
description:
A city full of hope, an oasis that rises in response. Clear, flowing water and adamant mountains surround Padishah. Amidst raucous cries and choking smoke, the dream shall come to its end.
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Homeland
description:
The destitute and homeless are entrusted to the estate of the missing magnate. The mercenary assassin glares beneath the moonlight. At dawn, Old Isin looks up to the stars. The chilly morning wind blows, and he still misses his terrible home.
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Approaching Blizzard
description: Icicles as dark as shadows.

name: Visitors From Afar
description: He had never felt so strongly about the journey he took in his younger years, until today. He suddenly felt dazed. Though he hated the desert, he never thought about where he could go.

name: Pack Tactics
description:
Nobody knows the origins of this 'hound' species, but the people of Bolívar were the first to use them in battle. Well-trained hounds provided a significant advantage on the field.
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Pack Tactics

<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Converging Lines

name: Long-Range Strike
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition: </>
More enemies will appear.

name: Breaking In
description:
Generally speaking, well-trained mercenaries will act according to your timetables during an assault— W-Wait, where are your hounds? Why'd your snipers go in first? What about your armored units? How come there's only one person in your vanguard?!
<@lv.item><Mobile Tactical Hangar></> Deploys drones as needed to assist enemy combatants.

name: Breaking In

<@lv.fs>Condition:</>

A battlefield's terrain is complex. When encountering a combat situation with asymmetrical firepower, a well-trained... Hey... Can't you see the enemy right next to you? Do you seriously have to chase the farthest target?

name: As the Empire's Shadow
description: A thousand years have passed since the people of Ursus overthrew the Hippogryph, and the Empire's glory now sweeps across the highest edifices and mountains. It is Ursus's deepest desire to cast the vast shadow of the Emperor's Will across the land.

name: As the Empire's Shadow
description:
<@lv.fs>Condition:</>
7 tiles on the battlefield are no longer available for deployment.

name: Operation Lamarck
description: Magnethill No. 2 is a biological evolution lab located in the southern Ural Mountains. Abandoned for years, the lab has been forgotten with the passage of time. Ten days ago, a group of unidentified militants snuck into the lab and began to activate the equipment in the lab.

name: Sargon Desert
description:
Of the harsh wastelands all over Terra, the deserts of Sargon are perhaps the least suitable for the sustenance of life. The arid and scorching climate, endless sandstorms, and giant monsters are some of the disasters that any prospective traveler will need to overcome.
<@lv.item><Sandstorm></> Allied units caught inside the sandstorm will have reduced ATK, continuously take damage over time, and have extended redeployment time; Enemy units will instead be slowed.

name: Field Records
description:
This is just a simple task, and there won't be anything complicated—— Many stories start in this manner, but we all know that things seldom end up that simple.'
<@lv.item><Dirt Mound> </>A reinforceable structure that can be used to resist sandstorms.

name: Defensive Range Expansion
description:
——Protect, remain alert, and do not make enemies of the locals. This rickety safehouse is safe for now——
<@lv.item><Reinforcement Device></> Can reinforce dirt mounds to make them immune to the effects of sandstorms.

name: Safehouse Battle
description:
——The attackers' identities are unknown, and the local community has suffered heavy casualties. The status quo has been broken, and conflict is unavoidable——
><@lv.item><High-Energy Originium Bomb></> Deals True Damage to enemies in a large area when detonated, and can also destroy dirt mounds.
<@lv.rem>Some characters cannot be deployed in this stage.</>

name: Sector Sweep
description:
——There are so many enemies, but we cannot sit around and wait to die——
<@lv.item><Sandstorm></> Allied units caught inside the sandstorm will have reduced ATK, continuously take damage over time, and have extended redeployment time; Enemy units will instead be slowed.

name: Supply Recovery Plan
description:
——Supplies are scarce, materials are in short supply, the crisis has not been alleviated, and threats arrive unpredictably——
<@lv.item><Sandstorm> </>Allied units caught inside the sandstorm will have reduced ATK, continuously take damage over time, and have extended redeployment time; Enemy units will instead be slowed.
